commits.message: üì∏ PHOTO: Modular Photo Configuration Architecture & Gallery Enhancements
commits.details: Refactored photo configuration into modular enterprise structure. Enhanced photo grid components with consistent styling and improved gallery functionality. Added modular photo-config directory with specialized modules. Improved PhotoPreviewModal and photo handling across all components.

commits.message: üóÇÔ∏è TYPES: Modular Relationship Types Architecture & Deprecation Strategy
commits.details: Refactored 698-line monolithic relationships.ts into modular enterprise architecture. Created organized type modules with backward compatibility. Added comprehensive deprecation warnings and migration guides. Enhanced type safety and developer experience.

Refactored 825-line monolithic ContactRelationshipManager into modular enterprise architecture. Created specialized components (RelationshipForm, RelationshipList, OrganizationTree) and custom hooks (useRelationshipList, useRelationshipForm, useOrganizationTree). Enhanced database migrations and maintainability through separation of concerns.

commits.message: üè¢ ENTERPRISE: Modular Database Schema Architecture & Clean-up
commits.details: Replaced monolithic contact-relationships.sql with modular enterprise structure. Created comprehensive modular schema architecture in src/database/schemas/contact-relationships/ directory. Updated BACKUP_SUMMARY.json with latest fix details. Enhanced enterprise database design patterns.

commits.message: üîß FIX: TabConfigFactory API Consistency & Generic Component Exports
commits.details: Fixed TabConfigFactory API inconsistencies and enhanced generic component exports. Improved ContactRelationshipManager with real service integration, fixed form submission handlers, and added success notifications. Enhanced EmployeeSelector with actual ContactsService integration. Updated field mappers to include contact IDs for relationship management.
